content.text:
# Warly Ceriani

Warly Ceriani (1903 – 3 May 1983 in Buenos Aires) was a classic Argentine actor who appeared in major Argentine films from 1938 to 1959.
Ceriani made almost 50 film appearances in Argentina from 1938 to 1959, appearing in films such as Julio Irigoyen's Academia El Tango Argentino (1942).
